price: Basi maneno yao yasikuhuzunishe. Hakika Sisi tunayajua wanayo yaweka siri na wanayo yatangaza.
arabic: فَلَا يَحۡزُنكَ قَوۡلُهُمۡۘ إِنَّا نَعۡلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَ
footnotes: Basi yasikuhuzunishe maneno yao kumkhusu Mwenyezi Mungu kwa kumkufuru, na kukukhusu wewe kwa kukwambia mwongo. Hakika Sisi tunayajua wanayo yaficha na wanayo yatangaza. Nasi tutawalipa kwa hayo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: falā yaḥzunka qawluhum innā naʿlamu mā yusirrūna wamā yuʿ'linūna
